snippet: “A Wanted Man” is Lee Child’s 17th Jack Reacher novel and the last to be published before Reacher goes Hollywood with a big Christmas movie.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book A Wanted Man: A Jack Reacher Novel by Lee Child.
lead_paragraph: “A Wanted Man” is Lee Child’s 17th Jack Reacher novel and the last to be published before Reacher goes Hollywood with a big Christmas movie.

headline.seo: ‘A Wanted Man: A Jack Reacher Novel’ by Lee Child
headline.main: Frayed Man of Action With a Head for Figures
headline.print_headline: Frayed Man Of Action With a Head For Figures
